author: James Bisbee, Dan Honig
title: Sanders was losing to Biden anyway. But he lost more in areas with coronavirus cases.
description: The virus could have cost Sanders as much as 7 points in some places.
content: In a recent working paper, we find evidence that coronavirus-induced anxiety prompted a political flight to safety that cost Sanders votes. Our findings suggest that if a coronavirus case was reported in a countys local media market before its primary, that n… [+6220 chars]
